title: Looking to join a Esports team (Im currently Diamond)
body:
Hi my ign is = Dàmato
Discord = Sebastion123#8478
I main adc (Well in ranked i fill but i just get adc majority of the time), i can play any role at a high level, i currently coach on lolcoaching.com and i am looking to join a team. If any teams are interested in bringing me on-board please contact me on league or discord.
